articles.author: Nathaniel Janowitz, Deborah Bonello
articles.title: Grenades, Guns, and Dynamite: Ecuador Prison Gangs Keep Killing Each Other
articles.description: The latest gang massacre brings the death toll in Ecuador's prisons to more than 300 this year.
articles.content:
Another massacre in a notorious prison in Ecuador over the weekend left at least 68 inmates dead and 25 wounded. 
The latest riot is connected to an ongoing war between prison gangs that has led to … [+3122 chars]
